title: Lady Death
lyrics:
In the moonlit splendor of the night we move
Transcendent fire reflects in her eyes
In a violent burst of power
Through the mass' dreadful sounds
I dance with the godess
While the earth shakes in its grounds



Beautiful and severe

Graceful yet fierce

Lady Death

Black Madonna

Release your unbridled rage upon my soul



Terrible, majestic

Her love runs deep through time

Destroy my mind

Dear child of the ancient night

In the depths of your mystic darkness

I must die



Beautiful and severe

Graceful yet fierce

Lady Death

Black Madonna

Release your unbridled rage upon my soul
